title: List of long time bugs in League
body:
Hi staff, here is a list of long time bugs in league that should be pretty easy to fix. I've submitted a bug report for one of them, but can't be bothered doing seperate reports for all of them:

* 'disable relative colours' doesn't work (your team is always blue whether you have it selected or not)
* after spectating a game, you get some error message about performing maintenance
* mega gnar icon in spectate mode is a black box (since release, was briefly fixed but then reverted to this bug again in a later patch)
* some champions (e.g. garen, sivir) move as if they have broken legs in spectator mode
* cannot see all chat in spectator mode anymore
* when kog'maw dies, you cannot click your mouse near his arcathain surprise (passive)
* friends status is often incorrect e.g. says they are in game when they aren't

Thanks.

replies.body: essence reaver doesnt return mana on crit moves eg pantheon
Teemo first blind on gromp doesn't work.

If you want to report bugs you should head on over to the Report a Bug board: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Don't think that first one is a bug though. Team is always blue to keep readability and consistency, relative colours applies to things like turrets. Relative colours on means red side [owls] will be blue when you're on that side, turned off red side will always be red.
